name: Snow Blocks 2
description:
Snow Blocks 2 is the continuation of the first part of the exciting 3D puzzle! The snow has melted and the world of snow blocks is in danger! You have to wake up the ice dragon to save this world! Destroy the blocks so that the emerald blocks end up on the ground! But be careful, there are other rules to the game!

In the game you will find many levels of varying difficulty and different blocks that you have to destroy! Read the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Whether you can walk this path depends only on you!

Game Features:
- Multi-level
- Convenient controls
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
